conbody.p:
There are a number of command-line euca2ools available to work with elastic IP addresses.
View public IP addresses:euca-describe-addresses <verbose>The <verbose> option can only be used by the cloud administrator. It displays all addresses and not just those owned by the cloud administrator.
Reserve an elastic IP address from the public IP address pool:euca-allocate-address
Assign an elastic IP address to an instance:euca-associate-address -i <instance_ID> <IP>
Disassociate an elastic IP address from an instance:euca-disassociate-address <IP>
Release an elastic IP address back to the public address pool:euca-release-address <IP>
